description.title: THIS MAKES A PERFECT GIFT FOR :
description.pera: Delivered product might vary slightly from the image shown.This product is perishable therefore delivery will be attempted only once.The delivery cannot be redirected to any other address. Warranty not applicable for this product. Company return policy not applicable for this product.

description.title: THIS MAKES A PERFECT GIFT FOR :
description.pera: Your Girlfriend, Boyfriend, Brother or Husband to wish them a happy birthday.

reviews.comment: Each piece of candy is like a mini work of art. They are almost too pretty to eat. Of course, they are too delicious to not eat!
Each piece of candy is like a mini work of art. They are almost too pretty to eat. Of course, they are too delicious to not eat!
